definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The Console should indicate that both subscribers received a copy of the message.
sentences.chinese: 控制檯應該指示兩個訂戶均收到了該消息的複本。

sentences.english: I put photocopies of my drawings all over the walls.
sentences.chinese: 我把自己畫的畫的照片複本貼滿了牆面。

sentences.english: Of, based on, or using the principles of bimetallism .
sentences.chinese: 以複本位製爲基礎，或與之相關。

sentences.english: You can also call their office and ask the secretary to give you their fax number.
sentences.chinese: 傳真發完之後，再給馬丁的辦公室傳一份複本。

sentences.english: However, sometimes you might want to restore the dataset from the backup copy.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有時您可能要從備份複本還原資料集。

sentences.english: Have them faxed over with a copy also faxed to Martin’s office.
sentences.chinese: 傳真發完後，再給馬丁的辦公室傳一份複本。

sentences.english: The Provide Data function provides copies of stored AIPs to Access.
sentences.chinese: 供應數據功能爲存取功能模塊提供檔案信息包的複本。

sentences.english: You will make a copy of the initial recording and use that as your new test.
sentences.chinese: 您可以製作一個最初記錄的複本，作爲您的新測試。

sentences.english: You have the right to request a copy of the personal information we may hold on you.
sentences.chinese: 您有權利向金佰利索取一份您的個人資料複本。

sentences.english: Compare the copy in your workspace to the version on the server that is checked out to you.
sentences.chinese: 比較工作區中的複本與伺服器上已簽出給您的版本。
